readable.title: 54501196_a9ac9d66f2
readable.content: A backpacker in the mountains using his hiking stick to point at a glacier . A backpacker points to the snow-capped mountains as he stands on a rocky plain . A hiker is pointing towards the mountains . A hiker poses for a picture in front of stunning mountains and clouds . A man with a green pack using his pole to point to snowcapped mountains .
